title: Midnight Moon
description: In the second exciting book in the Rise of the Dark Angel Series, Phoenix comes to terms with the fact that the world isn’t what she always believed it to be. Jayden, who she’s fallen in love with, is a Dark Angel. He fell from the light, and followed Vyco through the darkest of places.In this installment Phoenix, along with her best friend, Sadie, and their friends and family have enough of hiding in the dark. They want their world back and will do whatever it takes to accomplish that goal. They leave the cave and see what the world has turned into, but most importantly they begin to have hope, hope that they won’t be thrust in forever darkness.They have to battle, not only enemy soldiers, but dark forces, as well. This story is filled with love, laughter, suspense, and the truest form of friendship.
author: Melody Anne
